event_name: Comedy Standup Show with Dominic Barrreat
description: Prepare to laugh your heart out as comedian Dominic Barrreat takes the stage for a side-splitting comedy standup show. Get ready for an evening filled with laughter and unforgettable humor. This hilarious night is not to be missed!

event_name: Urban Music Orchestra at City Mega Hall Khulna
description: Immerse yourself in the mesmerizing sounds of the Urban Music Orchestra. Join us for a musical journey like no other, featuring a symphony of urban rhythms that will captivate your senses. Experience the magic of live music!

Get ready to dance the night away at our electrifying DJ party with DJ Ersfjordbotn. Join us for an unforgettable night of music, dance, and entertainment. The Khulna Zilla Stadium will come alive with beats and excitement!
